# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

This repository is no longer maintained. Please see [mholt/archives](https://github.com/mholt/archives) instead.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| >= 4.x  | :x:                |
| < 4.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please send the details to:

- Matthew Holt <matt at dyanim dot com>
